structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.text: KRS 186.045 and 186.070 to 186.240 shall apply to the registration of trailers, semitrailers, and recreational vehicles if practicable.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 395, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 19, effective January 1, 1967. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 10.
